welcome_message: Welcome to Medicare/Medicaid MA Navigation Consultation. I can help you understand your options, meet critical deadlines, and find assistance programs to reduce your healthcare costs.
expert_intro: I apply Massachusetts SHINE counseling principles to help you avoid costly penalties and maximize your benefits through state-specific programs.
